task.title: Removing plug-ins
task.shortdesc: Plug-ins can be installed by running uninstallation process.

choices.choice: Using the dita command line tool, run the uninstallation command: dita -uninstall plug-in-id
Using Ant, from the toolkit directory run the uninstallation target: ant -f integrator.xml uninstall -Dplugin.id=plug-in-id
